984630.name: Trainz 2019 DLC - RZD-UZ-RIC Wagons
984630.description:
The RIC and UZ passenger wagons are made in compliance with the highest quality standards and precision. Photo realistic textures and geometry has been recreated as accurately as possible to deliver the characteristics and details of the original wagons.

Standard European track width 1435 mm is equipped with a screw coupling, day and night salon, doorway.

Wagons for the Russian track width of 1520mm It is equipped with day and night salon, door opening.

In order for you to experience these passenger wagons you need to place them in surveyor.
984630.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 俄语
